tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Compound Probability of Independent Events
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Probability of particular sequences of flips

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: That is the best damn﻿ quarter I've ever seen drawn on a computer.

The answer is on KhanAcademy [dot] org/about/faq#equipment : I use Camtasia Recorder ($200) + SmoothDraw3(Free) + a Wacom Bamboo Tablet ($80) on a PC. I used to use﻿ ScreenVideoRecorder($20) and Microsoft Paint (Free).
Sal, what﻿ program did you use?
Build Your﻿ Passive Income With An Automated Internet Marketing System [ goo.gl\RXIRC]
He said head so many times﻿ I'm just wondering how no one has said " that's what she said " yet . .
Reminded me of high school. Your video makes﻿ it all easy to understand! Cheers.
If I flip a coin﻿ whats the chance ill get head?
Thank you so much for﻿ making this easier for me. Indeed YES WE KHAN!!!
i am so happy﻿ i found u !!!!!!!!!!!
Hey Khan, can you please explain﻿ Variable Change?
P(5H,5T) in any order? there's a math equation in﻿ there, i just cant figure it out...

press window in your computer All programs Accessories Paint program
I think that but I am not sure, just make the back﻿ ground of it as black and use different color, Oh don't use a pen when you type, because our teacher using here a mouse pen not a regular mouse
Gays check out how﻿ to become popular Russian invention /watch?v=Y-pztzYMasA&feature=g-upl&context=G2f02875AUAAAAAAAAAA
Thanks for that. Lol, I've﻿ been on khanacademy many times but never knew such a section existed.
I was﻿ thinking the same too but the problem with that is that MS Paint doesn't support pressure sensitivity.

Reviewer.Books: Anything by Danielle Steel, Debbie Macomber or Johanna Lindsey
Reviewer.Movies: Faith like potatoes & A walk to remember
transformers and spiderman.. and lots more cool stuff xD
